text: 10.43 Ais 33.24, 53.5-6, 53.11, Jer 31.34, Dan 9.24, Mai 7.18, Sek 13.1, Lom 10.11, Gal 3.22 Pen adek anɨb ak, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok mɨdupsek agɨlak, Klays ne apɨl gɨnɨgab tek, binɨb nop gos lɨnɨgɨnɨgabal okok, God kɨlop mɨdupsek tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal ak tɨg walɨg gɨyokɨnɨgab agɨlak agak.
